speaker: SHALLOW
text: Nay, you shall see my orchard, where, in an

speaker: SHALLOW

text: graffing, with a dish of caraways, and so forth.—

text: Come, cousin Silence.—And then to bed.

speaker: FALSTAFF

text: all, Sir John. Marry, good air.—Spread, Davy,

speaker: SHALLOW

speaker: FALSTAFF

speaker: SHALLOW
text: varlet, Sir John. By the Mass, I have drunk too

speaker: SHALLOW
text: much sack at supper. A good varlet. Now sit down,

speaker: SHALLOW
text: now sit down.—Come, cousin.

speaker: SHALLOW

merry.

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: Away, Bardolph.—Saddle my horse.—

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: Master Robert Shallow, choose what office thou

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: wilt in the land, ’tis thine.—Pistol, I will double-charge

speaker: PISTOL

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: my Lord Shallow, be what thou wilt. I am

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: night.—O sweet Pistol!—Away, Bardolph!—Come,

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: Pistol, utter more to me, and withal devise something

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: to do thyself good.—Boot, boot, Master Shallow.

text: I know the young king is sick for me. Let us

speaker: FALSTAFF

speaker: FALSTAFF

speaker: FALSTAFF
